BuxomMod:PopPopPop.NAME: Pop, Pop, Pop!
BuxomMod:PopPopPop.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 buxommod:Buxom !M! times. NL Draw !M! cards.
BuxomMod:PopPopPop.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 buxommod:Buxom !M! times. NL Draw !M! cards.

BuxomMod:BouncyExercise.NAME: Bouncy Exercise
BuxomMod:BouncyExercise.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage, then deal damage equal to your current buxommod:Buxom. Lose 1 buxommod:Buxom.

BuxomMod:Chibis.NAME: Chibis!
BuxomMod:Chibis.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Orb slot(s). Channel 1 BuxomMod:Defensive Chibi.

BuxomMod:OmegaForce.NAME: Omega Force
BuxomMod:OmegaForce.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Exhaust all status cards in your hand, and gain 1 Strength for each.

BuxomMod:HeavyLactation.NAME: Heavy Lactation
BuxomMod:HeavyLactation.DESCRIPTION: Gain buxommod:Milk equal to your buxommod:Buxom. Heal equal to half your buxommod:Buxom. NL Exhaust.
BuxomMod:HeavyLactation.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. Gain buxommod:Milk equal to your Buxom. Heal equal to half your buxommod:Buxom. NL Exhaust.

BuxomMod:BovineForm.NAME: Bovine Form
BuxomMod:BovineForm.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! buxommod:Buxom. NL Gain !M! buxommod:Lactating. NL Gain !M! buxommod:Milk.

BuxomMod:DefaultAttackWithVariable.NAME: Special Strike
BuxomMod:DefaultAttackWithVariable.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage [E] times. NL (Deal !BuxomMod:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

BuxomMod:OmegaFumes.NAME: Omega Fumes
BuxomMod:OmegaFumes.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable and !BuxomMod:SecondMagic! Poison to ALL enemies. NL Add 2 *Afterswell to your draw pile. NL Exhaust.

BuxomMod:ExposureStatus.NAME: Exposure
BuxomMod:ExposureStatus.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL Ethereal. NL At the end of your turn, gain 1 Vulnerable.

BuxomMod:Omegabsorption.NAME: Omegabsorption
BuxomMod:Omegabsorption.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust a card. NL Gain !M! buxommod:Buxom. NL Draw !M! cards.

BuxomMod:KCupBra.NAME: K-Cup Bra
BuxomMod:KCupBra.DESCRIPTION: buxommod:Capacity 0-5. NL Gain 2 Strength. Gain !M! Block at the end of your turn.

BuxomMod:MCupBra.NAME: M-Cup Bra
BuxomMod:MCupBra.DESCRIPTION: BuxomMod:Capacity 5-10. NL Draw !M! additional cards at the start of your turn, and gain double that amount of block.

BuxomMod:BrokenBraK.NAME: Broken Bra (K)
BuxomMod:BrokenBraK.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL At the end of your turn, add 1 *Bounce to your draw pile.

BuxomMod:BrokenBraM.NAME: Broken Bra (M)
BuxomMod:BrokenBraM.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL At the end of your turn, add 2 *Bounce to your draw pile.

BuxomMod:ChibiSummon.NAME: Chibi Summon
BuxomMod:ChibiSummon.DESCRIPTION: Lose 2 BuxomMod:Buxom. NL Channel 1 BuxomMod:Defensive Chibi.

BuxomMod:ButtonPop.NAME: Button Pop
BuxomMod:ButtonPop.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain 1 BuxomMod:Buxom. NL Inflict !M! Weak.

BuxomMod:ButtonHazard.NAME: Button Hazard
BuxomMod:ButtonHazard.DESCRIPTION: Deal !M! damage to a random enemy whenever you gain BuxomMod:Buxom. NL BuxomMod:Milking 2: Deal !BuxomMod:SecondMagic! additional damage.

BuxomMod:LeanneAssist.NAME: Leanne Assist
BuxomMod:LeanneAssist.DESCRIPTION: Lose 1 BuxomMod:Buxom. NL Deal !D! damage to all enemies. NL BuxomMod:Milking 1: Deal !D! damage to all enemies again.

BuxomMod:Relief.NAME: Relief
BuxomMod:Relief.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Block whenever you Exhaust a card.
BuxomMod:Relief.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Block whenever you Exhaust a card.

BuxomMod:ToplessStatus.NAME: Topless
BuxomMod:ToplessStatus.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL Retain. NL At the end of your turn, add 1 *Bounce to your draw pile.

BuxomMod:AftershockStatus.NAME: Afterswell
BuxomMod:AftershockStatus.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL Ethereal. NL At the end of your turn, gain 1 BuxomMod:Buxom.

BuxomMod:Library.NAME: Omega Library
BuxomMod:Library.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Gain !B! block. NL Add *OMEGA *Library to your draw pile. NL Exhaust.
BuxomMod:Library.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Gain !B! block. NL Add *OMEGA *Library to your draw pile. NL Exhaust.

BuxomMod:OmegaLibrary.NAME: OMEGA Library
BuxomMod:OmegaLibrary.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Add *Library to your draw pile. NL Exhaust.

BuxomMod:MeasurementTime.NAME: Measurement Time
BuxomMod:MeasurementTime.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, gain !M! Block. NL Decreases each time your BuxomMod:Buxom increases.

BuxomMod:OmegaArc.NAME: Omega Arc
BuxomMod:OmegaArc.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !M! times. NL If your BuxomMod:Buxom is less than 7, damage ALL enemies.

BuxomMod:OmegaDeflection.NAME: Omega Deflection
BuxomMod:OmegaDeflection.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Artifact. NL Add 2 *Afterswell to your draw pile. NL Exhaust.

BuxomMod:OmegaShock.NAME: Omega Shock
BuxomMod:OmegaShock.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, if you have a Status card in your hand, deal damage equal to your BuxomMod:Buxom to a random enemy.
BuxomMod:OmegaShock.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, if you have a Status card in your hand, deal damage equal to your BuxomMod:Buxom twice to a random enemy.

BuxomMod:SwellingTight.NAME: Swelling Tight
BuxomMod:SwellingTight.DESCRIPTION: If you're within the BuxomMod:Capacity of your bra, gain 3 BuxomMod:Buxom and !M! [E].

BuxomMod:TCupBra.NAME: T-Cup Bra
BuxomMod:TCupBra.DESCRIPTION: BuxomMod:Capacity 10-15. NL Gain [E] and !M! Dexterity each time your BuxomMod:Buxom increases. If this bra breaks, lose all your Dexterity.

BuxomMod:BrokenBraT.NAME: Broken T-Cup Bra
BuxomMod:BrokenBraT.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL At the start of your turn, lose [E]. At the end of your turn, add 2 *Afterswell to your draw pile.

BuxomMod:ChibiAttack.NAME: Chibi Attack
BuxomMod:ChibiAttack.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to your BuxomMod:Buxom. NL Channel !M! BuxomMod:Offensive Chibi.

BuxomMod:ChibiBlock.NAME: Chibi Block
BuxomMod:ChibiBlock.DESCRIPTION: Gain Block equal to your BuxomMod:Buxom. Exhaust.

BuxomMod:OmegaFlare.NAME: Omega Flare
BuxomMod:OmegaFlare.DESCRIPTION: If you're within the BuxomMod:Capacity of your bra, gain !M! Strength. NL Shuffle !BuxomMod:SecondMagic! *Afterswell into your draw pile.
BuxomMod:OmegaFlare.CANT_USE_MESSAGE: I'm not within my bra's capacity!

BuxomMod:SteadyLactation.NAME: Steady Lactation
BuxomMod:SteadyLactation.DESCRIPTION: If you have less than 6 BuxomMod:Buxom, gain up to 6 BuxomMod:Buxom. NL Gain !M! BuxomMod:Lactating. NL Gain !M! BuxomMod:Milk.
BuxomMod:SteadyLactation.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: If you have less than 6 BuxomMod:Buxom, gain BuxomMod:Buxom up to 6. NL Gain !M! BuxomMod:Lactating. NL Gain !M! BuxomMod:Milk.

BuxomMod:Paizuri.NAME: Paizuri
BuxomMod:Paizuri.DESCRIPTION: If the enemy intends to attack, inflict !M! Weak and draw !M! cards. NL BuxomMod:Milking !BuxomMod:MilkCost!: Also inflict !M! Vulnerable.

BuxomMod:OmegaBeatdown.NAME: Omega Beatdown
BuxomMod:OmegaBeatdown.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to your BuxomMod:Buxom !M! time(s), then again for every channeled orb.

BuxomMod:ExpandMind.NAME: Expand Mind
BuxomMod:ExpandMind.DESCRIPTION: Retain your hand this turn. NL Draw !M! card. NL Exhaust.
BuxomMod:ExpandMind.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain your hand this turn. NL Draw !M! cards.

BuxomMod:InducedLactation.NAME: Induced Lactation
BuxomMod:InducedLactation.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! BuxomMod:Milk. NL Add 1 *Afterswell to your draw pile.
BuxomMod:InducedLactation.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! BuxomMod:Milk. NL Add 1 *Afterswell to your draw pile. NL Shuffle this card into your draw pile.

BuxomMod:BraBreaker.NAME: Bra Breaker
BuxomMod:BraBreaker.DESCRIPTION: If wearing a *Bra: Gain enough BuxomMod:Buxom to break it. NL Deal !M! damage to ALL enemies for each existing Status card. *Big *Bounces count double, and *Broken *Bras count triple. NL (Deals !D! damage.)

BuxomMod:BigBouncePowerCard.NAME: Big Bounce
BuxomMod:BigBouncePowerCard.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Buxom. NL Generate a *Bounce with every 7 Bounce stacks instead, and change them to *Big *Bounces.
BuxomMod:BigBouncePowerCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. Gain !M! Buxom. NL Generate a *Bounce with every 7 Bounce stacks instead, and change them to *Big *Bounces.

BuxomMod:BigBounceStatus.NAME: Big Bounce
BuxomMod:BigBounceStatus.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL Ethereal. NL At the end of your turn, deal damage to a random enemy equal to half your Buxom.

BuxomMod:OmegaBurst.NAME: Omega Burst
BuxomMod:OmegaBurst.DESCRIPTION: You can't gain *Block this turn. NL Shuffle your discard pile into your draw pile. NL This turn, whenever you gain BuxomMod:Buxom or draw a Status card, draw !M! card(s). NL Exhaust.

BuxomMod:BouncyBlock.NAME: Bouncy Block
BuxomMod:BouncyBlock.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Deal !D! damage for every Status card in your hand.

BuxomMod:FeelItOut.NAME: Feel It Out
BuxomMod:FeelItOut.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Draw all the Status cards in your draw pile.
